jd: From: bhuwan tiwari, Sonitalentcorp bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com Job Role: JAVA Software Engineer Duration: 6 months+ Location: Onsite Day 1 Urbandale IA ( Local only) Visa: USC, GC only Interview: Video Note: Glider assessment candidate need to take if selected on the interview Job Description: Must be an excellent and effective communicator. This is just as important as the technical skills. We don't want great coders that want to be left alone. This is a collaborative team. Let me know if you have any other questions. Thanks. We'd like someone who can be on site in Urbandale 3 days a week (T/W/TH). Worker should be comfortable working in a paired programming environment and be an excellent communicator. High priority given to soft skills such as self-driven and takes initiative. Works on a product team and supports product design by planning its work, coordinating with others, and writing and testing code to deliver functionality for the complete product or products it supports. Most important technical skills are Java and AWS. (3 - 6 years) Experience in programming/software development (Java (90%), NodeJS (8%), Scala (2%))(3 - 6 years) Product design, test and/or analysis experience(3 years) Experience hosting services in AWS cloud technologies(3 years) Ability to manage many competing priorities/requests in a fast-paced environment(3 years) Excellence in verbal and written communication forms with tact and negotiation Thanks, Bhuwan Tiwari Sr.Technical Recruiter SoniTalent Corporation I5404 Merribrook Lan--e, Prospect, KY, USA bhuwan.tiwari@sonitalentcorp.com
